alert.note: Alert for Mahoning; Portage; Stark; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Portage, southern Trumbull, Mahoning and northeastern Stark Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alliance, or 13 miles west of Salem, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Youngstown, Warren, Boardman, Alliance, Niles, Campbell, Hubbard, Canfield, Sebring, Lordstown, Hilltop, Maplewood Park, Leavittsburg, Vienna Center, Austintown, Struthers, Girard, McDonald, Ellsworth and Craig Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Ohio.
